author: TheBrickDudeStudios
title: Cool Minifig
review:
Hat

The lion hat that she is wearing is not that accurate to the film but it is close. It has two eyes and a nose. It has some ribbons gold and brown that are all around the lion hat.

Hair

She also comes with hair. It is a blonde ponytail that sort of looks like her hair from the film.

Head

Her head has two expressions. One is happy and the other one is slightly worried.

Body

Her body has a cool print that has some pink polka-dots and some teal lines. The back of her body has the same pattern.

Legs

Her legs are dual-moulded and the top half is pink and the bottom half is dark red. She has some pocket details and in-between the dark red and pink there blue, teal and black stripes.

Accessory and stand 

She comes with a brown wand and an extra one. She has the regular black stand for CMF minifigs. 

Conclusion

I think this is one of the best minifigs from this series. The prints on this minifig are so detailed. I think you should get this minifig even if you are not a fan of Harry Potter (like me).
